description.value: The character has studied Tau military doctrine and can apply tactical knowledge to coordinate orderly retreats and tactical withdrawals.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, the explorer can make a +0 Scholastic Lore (Tau Empire) Test. If successful, they and any other Tau allies within 20 metres may immediately disengage as a free action.

rollConfig.description: Roll Scholastic Lore (Tau Empire) to coordinate tactical withdrawal

specialAbilities.name: Coordinated Withdrawal
specialAbilities.description: Once per encounter, you can make a Scholastic Lore (Tau Empire) Test. On a success, you and all Tau allies within 20 metres may immediately disengage as a free action.
